docs.snippet: Green Party candidate Jill Stein late Saturday vowed to bring her fight for a recount of votes cast in Pennsylvania in the U.S. presidential election to federal court, after a state judge ordered her campaign to post a $1 million bond....
docs.lead_paragraph: Green Party candidate Jill Stein late Saturday vowed to bring her fight for a recount of votes cast in Pennsylvania in the U.S. presidential election to federal court, after a state judge ordered her campaign to post a $1 million bond.

headline.main: Green Party's Stein to Pursue Pennsylvania Recount Petition in Federal Court
headline.print_headline: Green Party's Stein to Pursue Pennsylvania Recount Petition in Federal Court

docs.snippet: A Green Party-backed campaign changed its strategy to force a statewide recount of Pennsylvania's Nov. 8 presidential election, won by Republican Donald Trump, and said late Saturday night that it will seek help in the federal courts, rather than ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Green Party-backed campaign changed its strategy to force a statewide recount of Pennsylvania's Nov. 8 presidential election, won by Republican Donald Trump, and said late Saturday night that it will seek help in the federal courts, rather than the state courts.

headline.main: Green Party Switches Strategy in Pennsylvania Recount Bid
headline.print_headline: Green Party Switches Strategy in Pennsylvania Recount Bid
